meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or annoyance.
meanings.sent3: Jeeze, I forgot my lunch at home again.
meanings.sent4: The sudden rainstorm took us by surprise, jeeze!
meanings.sent5: The loud noise made me jump, jeeze!

meanings.definition: Used as a mild oath or expression of disbelief.
meanings.sent2: Jeeze, I never thought that would happen!
meanings.sent3: Jeeze, I can't believe I ate the whole pizza.
meanings.sent4: The magician's trick left us all saying 'jeeze' in amazement.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the shooting star made everyone gasp, jeeze!
